page.title: 02LANDSCAPE II
page.content: The{River Trent}is the southern boundary of the{Meadows.}People use it a lot. They use it for{fishing}which is very popular.People go on the {pleasure boats}for trips down the river, starting at Trent Bridge.The river is also used for{canoeing}and {rowing. Every year there is a firework display by the river. Lots of people gather round the steps of the river bank to watch. The{fireworks}are very pretty. There are not many{swans}on the river now because they are dying out from lead poisoning which is caused when they swallow the little lead weights discarded by anglers. Also the fishing line gets stuck round their legs.
